extendedInfo.description: Fusion Experience (Beta) uses the power of cloud computing to give you access to the full version of the Fusion ML system by MarketLinx on your Android devices. Note that Fusion Experience can only be used by real estate agents, brokers and other affiliated professionals that already have an active ML subscription with a valid user name and password.Fusion is a fast, fun, and easy ML application that emphasizes multi-tasking, agent/client collaboration, and system personalization. Fusion offers many exciting and innovative features, including:- Multi-tasking: the ability to edit multiple listings, run multiple searches, etc.- Three-way integration between Search Results, Mapping and Images- Informative map overlays and points of interest- Demographic content and charts- Auto-generated Quick CMA- Email/home page notifications triggered by website activity- And much more!Fusion Experience works best with WiFi or high-speed mobile connections, and provides support for mouse-centric controls such as hover effects and dragging and dropping.

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: This app was not design for Cell Phone. The main objective of Fusion is Cross Browser compatibility.  if you don\'t have a tablet or a computer you can delete this APP it was not designed for you.  I will recommend you to talk with your local MLS provider and ask them to develop something for cell phone use only.  In Connecticut we have CT Real Mobil > you will notice that has an agent login (from there they control their listings and contacts) and the general public classic search for everybody else.
reviews.author: Francisco Garcia

reviews.title: Still Beta...
reviews.comment: They have addressed the speed issues IMO but why are we still in beta after all this time? I really hope that the developers keep working to improve this app, because this is the future of real estate mobile communication networking... I can only imagine how many realty boards pay into having this for the members!
reviews.author: Kelly Aujla

reviews.title: All smiles
reviews.comment: Works great on my note 2.  Mls fusion , Imapp and transaction desk are performing fast.
reviews.author: idarousse charif

reviews.title: Not yet usable
reviews.comment: The lone star is for effort, but not for any functionality :-) In its current form, this app is not usable (Galaxy Tab 3)
reviews.author: P Reins

reviews.title: Fusion experience
reviews.comment: I Mapp would not open, search is clumsy. Still working through a lot of issues.
reviews.author: barry blake

reviews.title: Needs work but good start
reviews.comment: I\'ve seen a lot of negative comments related to this app and it seems to me that most of them are related to not knowing how to use it. Most of the complaints are related to the speed and ease of use. Firstly don\'t try to thumb tap like most apps. You need to use the Trac pad located in the bottom left corner. If you can figure this out it works quite well. Also speed can be related to the device or connection. The app needs work but if you can figure out the trac pad it can be very useful in the field.
reviews.author: Sean Simon

reviews.title: Horrible.  NO EFFORT WAS PUT INTO THIS APP...
reviews.comment: This is basically a modification of their puffin web browser app.  They didn\'t do squat other than remove the address bar and make it default to your mls website via a selection menu.  With the source code of their puffin browswer, I could have put this together in about 15 minutes.  This is an app store for the android devices and so this app should be designed for android devices.  I have no clue why they have a mouse/keyboard function when that is already built into android devices.
reviews.author: Dan Martinez

reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!!
reviews.comment: Shouldn\'t have to hit a keyboard icon to launch the keyboard in order to type in the field.   A crying shame someone was actually paid for developing this app.  Trash it and start over!
reviews.author: Brian coffey

reviews.title: Horrible,  please fix!
reviews.comment: Every  time I use Fusion I have to uninstall & reinstall the app. I get an error message that says I must use Internet Explorer. The device I purchased to use Fusion on, cozy me $500. It is now useless! !!
reviews.author: Cindi Rigsby

reviews.title: Android
reviews.comment: I have to reload it every time I want to use it.  Very useful if I do not want to drag out my computer.  A step up from my phone.
reviews.author: Karen Bullington Hogan

reviews.title: Not good!!!
reviews.comment: Not designed for phone!! not sure why this was released...???
reviews.author: Ikram Zouari

reviews.title: Tablet only
reviews.comment: Frustrating.  So close to being able to use the fusion software on a phone. App is slow, useful in a pinch but not as mls sheet replacement. Must be restarted every time you log out of fusion.
reviews.author: Jonathan Osman

reviews.title: Worked at first but not anymore.
reviews.comment: When starting up it immediately goes to an error screen that says it is for Internet Explorer only.
reviews.author: rick denis

reviews.title: Mls fusion
reviews.comment: This is not a app. Its just a website created in a app with a couple of extra functions. If this is the beta. The have a long way to go.
reviews.author: Karim Nasser

reviews.comment: Used to work on GS3 before recent Verizon Update, now get the IE error message others have mentioned.
reviews.author: Glenn Brunskill

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: This is not a replacement for the desktop version, just a tool for the road, don\'t expect all the functionality of the desktop version.
reviews.author: EMMANUEL MACHADO

reviews.title: \"fast, fun, easy??!\" No way
reviews.comment: 3 minutes to load a sign-in screen, then the so-called app sat for 5 minutes \"signing in\" -- unacceptable. Why release something that doesn\'t work? It\'s quicker to go back to the office and turn the computer on. Not even worth a single star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Wow. What a horrible and useless app. Really needs to be scratched and start.over.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: People, people, people...
reviews.comment: This is a \"beta\" version. It\'s free. Relax and enjoy the perk. That being said.... It\'s what I call the \"last resort\" when it comes to accessing the MLS.
reviews.author: Stefan Doerrfeld

reviews.title: The most horrific app I have ever seen
reviews.comment: Basing this app on an already VERY slow and questionable product; i.e. Fusion by CoreLogic, makes you wonder to blame CoreLogic or CloudMosa for this App. It is just a major disappointment. I wish the real estate boards collectively find a better solution than Fusion or Fusion Experience for their products. If I could, my rating would have been negative 5.
reviews.author: A Google User
